Class TableLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.TableLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layout

    public class TableLayout
extends Object
implements Layout
    A layout component allowing subcomponents to be placed in tabular form.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
